featured.text: At the end, you get a report of your dog’s cognitive profile.
The creation of the park was inspired by his daughter, Morgan, who suffers from severe cognitive delay and physical challenges.
A dog’s cognitive profile is composed of nine cognitive skills.
For US $60, a recently-founded company called Dognition will help you learn more about your dog’s cognitive traits.
They use a range of terms to describe it—stuck-song syndrome, sticky music, cognitive itch, or most commonly “earworm.”

definition.zh_def: 認知的；與思維、理解和知識相關的。
definition.en_def: Relating to the mental processes of perception, memory, judgment, and reasoning.
definition.example: Cognitive development is crucial during early childhood.
